name: Cosmic Waters
description:
Cosmic Waters is a game created by a team of young artists and coders between the ages of 13 and 17. This is our first ever game made together from 3 different countries, Canada, Germany and UK.  

The game consists of an originally designed, modeled, textured and rigged astronaut character trying to reach his final goal in a zero gravity environment.  It features a fully realized space station, and some original music.  We are happy to share this with you and we hope you enjoy it as much as we did making it!  

Thank you Epic Games for this Epic opportunity!

"Space Jazz"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
